description: "Good, you're here. We have a request from a former colonist to stash some items on the surface. We get these from time to time; it started out as people hoping their loved ones were still down there, in need of supplies... These days it's just a ritual for them. I guess this is how weird traditions start, huh?"
chainDescription:
The ICA often receives job commissions and requests for prospectors to carry out, acting as a sort of middleman to access the planet.
Handling these jobs keeps the the ICA happy, and they pay well enough, too.
